details.title: Surface plasmon microscopy and its application on supported membranes
details.abstract: Surface plasmon microscopy (SPM) was used in cooperation with surface plasmon resonarce (SPR) and microft uorescence film balarce to analyze an organized fatty acid LB film and an L-«-Phosphatidyl­ ethanolam ne Dimyristoyl (DMPE) mond ayer in phase separation state.
